summary: The diff implements scrollable dropdowns via max-height CSS and addresses workout page functionality. REQ-1 is satisfied through the addition of 'max-h-[300px]' to SelectContent in LogWeight.tsx. REQ-2 appears addressed through modifications to workout-related hooks and pages (WorkoutsList, WorkoutDetail), though specific error fixes are not explicitly documented in the truncated diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Added workout deletion functionality with confirmation dialog
hallucinated_features.reason: The WorkoutDetail.tsx file includes delete workout functionality with AlertDialog components and useDeleteWorkout hook, which was not requested in the BuildRequest
The WorkoutDetail.tsx includes an Edit button that navigates to an edit route, which was not part of the requested fixes

hallucinated_features.description: Modified useQueries.ts with extended exercise types and multiple new query functions
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints explicitly state 'Do not modify backend Motoko code' and 'Preserve current workout and exercise data structures', but useQueries.ts shows structural changes including ExerciseWithId type extension and comment about backend gap
